item.title: 商务部：美欧称中国产能过剩是 "贸易保护主义
item.description: 中国周四表示，美国和欧洲关于产能过剩的说法是 "赤裸裸的贸易保护主义"，限制世界第二大经济体新能源出口的努力将挫败全球应对气候变化的努力。【原文：China said on Thursday that U.S. and European assertions of excess capacity were "naked trade protectionism" and that efforts to constrain new energy exports from the World's No.2 economy would frustrate global efforts to tackle climate change.】

item.title: 新私有化的东芝将在重组中裁员 4,000 人
item.description: 日本东芝公司（Toshiba）周四表示，随着这家工业企业集团在新的所有权下加速重组，该公司将在国内裁减多达 4000 个工作岗位。【原文：Japan's Toshiba said on Thursday it will cut up to 4,000 jobs domestically as the industrial conglomerate accelerates restructuring under new ownership.】

item.title: 日本本田加大电气化投资，到 2030 财年投资额达 650 亿美元
item.description: 日本本田汽车公司（Honda Motor）周四表示，该公司承诺在 2030 财年之前的 10 年内，将电气化和软件投资增加一倍，达到约 650 亿美元。【原文：Japan's Honda Motor pledged to double its electrification and software investment to about $65 billion over the 10 years running through the 2030 business year, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 新加坡航空公司首席执行官称中国出境游尚未恢复
item.description: 新加坡航空公司（Singapore Airlines）首席执行官周四表示，中国的航空旅行需求尚未恢复到疫情爆发前的水平，但中国公民前往新加坡这个亚洲枢纽的免签证计划有助于填补座位，该公司今年将增加更多的中国运力。【原文：Air travel demand from China is not back to pre-pandemic levels for Singapore Airlines , but a visa-free scheme for Chinese citizens to the Asian hub has helped fill seats and the airline will add more China capacity this year, its CEO said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国提高对华关税，依赖中国的越南进口激增
item.description: 数据显示，随着美国通过提高关税加大力度减少与中国的贸易往来，它大大促进了从越南的进口，而越南的大部分出口都依赖于中国的投入。【原文：As the United States intensifies efforts to reduce trade with China by hiking tariffs, it has greatly boosted imports from Vietnam, which relies on Chinese input for much of its exports, data show.】

item.title: 西门子因工业业务陷入困境而未达盈利预期
item.description: 德国工程集团西门子公司周四表示，在其旗舰产品工厂自动化部门业绩放缓之后，该公司第二季度工业业务盈利有所下降。【原文：Siemens reported a drop in second quarter earnings at its industrial business, the German engineering group said on Thursday, after suffering a slowdown at its flagship factory automation division.】

item.title: 市场恐慌情绪蔓延，投资者转向风险资产
item.description: 美国股市创下新纪录，比特币飙升，投资者纷纷放弃投资组合下跌的保险，因为有证据表明，经济正在走向所谓的软着陆，这刺激了市场参与者的风险偏好。【原文：U.S. stocks are at fresh records, bitcoin is soaring and investors are spurning insurance against portfolio declines as evidence that the economy is headed for a so-called soft landing whets market participants' appetite for risk.】

item.title: 易捷航空对假期的押注如何获得回报
item.description: 易捷航空（EasyJet）首席执行官和投资人表示，易捷航空在套餐式假期和位置更好的机场上的大笔押注正在帮助其赢得客户，尽管人们仍然担心这家以免费服务著称的航空公司的战略成本过高。【原文：EasyJet's big bets on package holidays and better-located airports are helping it win customers, its CEO and investors say, even as concerns linger about the high cost of the strategy for an airline known for its no-frills service.】

item.title: 欧盟消费者组织向欧盟技术监管机构投诉，Temu 成为投诉对象
item.description: 周四，中国快时尚电子商务零售商特慕遭欧盟投诉，泛欧消费者组织 BEUC 称，PDD 集团旗下的特慕可能违反了网络内容规则。【原文：Chinese fast-fashion e-commerce retailer Temu was hit with a European Union complaint on Thursday, with pan-European consumers group BEUC saying the PDD Group-owned unit might have breached online content rules.】

item.title: 早间竞标CPI 派对走向世界
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 软银公司旨在通过人工智能 "软化 "愤怒的客户来电，帮助呼叫中心员工
item.description: 对于呼叫中心的工作人员来说，与恼怒的客户打交道可能会带来极大的压力，但日本软银公司（SoftBank Corp）认为它有一个解决方案：人工智能软件可以缓和客户的语气。【原文：Dealing with irate customers can be extremely stressful for call centre workers but Japan's SoftBank Corp thinks it has a solution: artificial intelligence-enabled software that softens the tone of customers' voices.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：中美关系紧张，微软要求数百名中国员工搬迁
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，微软正要求其在中国的云计算和人工智能业务部门约 700 至 800 名员工考虑调离中国。【原文：Microsoft is asking about 700 to 800 people in its China-based cloud-computing and artificial-intelligence operations to consider transferring outside the country, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，辉瑞出价高达 2.5 亿美元，以解决数以千计的 "善达 "癌症诉讼案
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，辉瑞公司已同意支付高达2.5亿美元的赔偿金，以了结美国1万多起有关其现已停产的胃灼热药物Zantac致癌风险的诉讼。【原文：Pfizer has agreed offer payment of up to $250 million to settle more than 10,000 lawsuits in the United States over cancer risks associated with its now-discontinued heartburn drug Zantac, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 4 月失业率上升，消除了加息风险
item.description: 周四的数据显示，澳大利亚4月份的就业人数增幅超过预期，但由于劳动力增长速度超过了创造就业的速度，失业率仍攀升至三个月来的最高点。【原文：Australian employment rose by more than expected in April, data showed on Thursday, but the jobless rate still climbed to a three-month top as the growth in workforce outpaced job creation.】

item.title: 政府计划购买未售出房屋的报道引发中国房地产股大涨
item.description: 周四，中国房地产开发商股价跳涨，此前有报道称，中国正在考虑一项计划，由全国各地的地方政府从不良企业手中购买数百万套未售出的住房，以缓解长期的房地产危机。【原文：Shares of Chinese property developers jumped on Thursday, after a report that China is considering a plan for local governments nationwide to buy millions of unsold homes from distressed companies to ease a protracted property crisis.】

item.title: 中国尼欧诺公司的目标是以 Onvo 品牌每年推出一款新车型
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商尼奥周四表示，该公司将每年推出一款价格较低的 "欧沃"（Onvo）品牌新车型，定价与汽油车相近。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Nio said on Thursday it would launch one new model per year under its lower-priced Onvo brand and price them similarly to gasoline vehicles, as the firm expands its lineups to family cars in the country's overcrowded auto market.】

item.title: 亚洲搭乘华尔街涨势，美元因美国通胀缓解而下挫
item.description: 在一份较为温和的美国通胀报告提高了美联储今年将至少降息两次的预期之后，受华尔街隔夜飙升至历史最高点的提振，亚洲股市周四反弹。【原文：Asian stock markets rallied on Thursday, buoyed by Wall Street's surge to all-time peaks overnight after a milder U.S. inflation report raised expectations the Federal Reserve will deliver at least two rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，英美资源集团在战略调整后冻结全球招聘
item.description: 据路透社查阅英美资源集团（Anglo）发布的一份内部备忘录，该集团本周承诺简化矿业公司的业务，而澳大利亚必和必拓公司（BHP）以 430 亿美元竞购该公司。【原文：Anglo American has frozen hiring globally after its pledge this week to simplify the miner that is the target of a $43 billion bid by Australia's BHP , according to an internal memo issued by Anglo and reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 由于出口和需求疲软，泰国第一季度经济增长可能乏力：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，尽管游客数量稳健增长，但受出口和内需疲软的影响，泰国经济在截至 3 月份的这一季度可能增长乏力。【原文：Growth in Thailand's economy was likely subdued in the quarter through March despite solid tourist arrivals, hampered by weak exports and domestic demand, a Reuters poll of economists found.】

item.title: 美国通胀放缓提振降息预期，美元下挫
item.description: 在美国核心通胀率创下三年来最慢、零售销售转为持平之后，美元周四跌至数月低点，这使得全球最大经济体降息的预期提前。【原文：The dollar skidded to multi-month lows on Thursday after U.S. core inflation hit its slowest in three years and retail sales turned flat, which pulled forward expectations for rate cuts in the world's biggest economy.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据温和，需求强劲，油价上涨
item.description: 周四，油价延续了上一交易日的涨势，原因是有迹象表明美国的需求更加强劲，数据显示美国的通胀率低于市场预期，这加强了降息的论据，而降息可能会导致需求更加强劲。【原文：Oil prices extended gains from the previous session on Thursday on signs of stronger demand in the U.S. where data showed slower inflation than markets expected, strengthening the argument for an interest rate cut which could result in even stronger demand.】

item.title: 智利给予 Albemarle 增加 24 万吨锂配额的选择权
item.description: 智利经济发展机构 CORFO 周三表示，它与 Albemarle 公司达成了一项协议，为这家美国公司增加 24 万公吨锂金属当量（LME）的生产配额提供了选择权。【原文：Chile's economic development agency CORFO on Wednesday said it reached an agreement with Albemarle to establish an option for the U.S. company to increase its production quota by 240,000 metric tons of lithium metal equivalent (LME).】

item.title: 日本经济下滑，使日本央行的加息计划复杂化
item.description: 日本经济在第一季度出现萎缩，受到消费和外部需求疲软的挤压，这给政策制定者带来了新的挑战，因为央行希望将利率从接近零的水平上调高。【原文：Japan's economy contracted in the first quarter, squeezed by weaker consumption and external demand and throwing a fresh challenge to policymakers as the central bank looks to lift interest rates away from near-zero levels.】

item.title: 日本第一季度国内生产总值年率萎缩 2.0%，原因是消费和出口疲软
item.description: 日本政府周四公布的数据显示，受私人消费和出口疲软的影响，1-3 月份日本经济按年率计算环比萎缩 2.0%。【原文：Japan's economy contracted at an annualised clip of 2.0% in January-March from the previous quarter, weighed by sluggish private consumption and exports, government data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Coatue 第一季度减持苹果股票，Viking 建立仓位
item.description: 周三的证券文件显示，对冲基金 Coatue Management 在第一季度减持了苹果公司的股票，而 Viking Global Investors 则建立了相当规模的新仓位。【原文：Hedge fund Coatue Management dissolved its stake in Apple Inc in the first quarter while Viking Global Investors built a sizeable new position, securities filings showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: IBM 将在爱尔兰增加 800 个人工智能相关岗位
item.description: 爱尔兰国家投资局（IDA Ireland）周四表示，IBM 计划在爱尔兰增聘多达 800 名员工，以帮助打造以人工智能技术为支撑的先进软件，这是爱尔兰跨国公司部门今年宣布的最大一桩招聘计划。【原文：IBM plans to hire up to 800 more people in Ireland to help build advanced software underpinned by AI technology, the biggest job announcement in the country's multinational sector this year, state investment agency IDA Ireland said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特斯拉必须面对车主就自动驾驶索赔提起的诉讼
item.description: 一名美国法官周三驳回了特斯拉要求驳回指控埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的电动汽车公司误导车主相信他们的汽车不久将具备自动驾驶功能的诉讼。【原文：A U.S. judge on Wednesday rejected Tesla's bid to dismiss a lawsuit accusing Elon Musk's electric car company of misleading owners into believing that their vehicles could soon have self-driving capabilities.】

item.title: 比特币 ETF 在第一季度吸引了 Millenium Global 和威斯康星退休系统的押注
item.description: 根据最近的监管文件显示，包括千禧年管理有限责任公司（Millennium Management LLC）在内的一些对冲基金和其他资产管理机构在第一季度收购了最近推出的与比特币价格挂钩的美国交易所交易基金（ETF）的股份。【原文：A handful of hedge funds, including Millennium Management LLC, and other asset managers are among the institutions that acquired stakes in the recently launched U.S. exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tied to the price of bitcoin in the first quarter, according to recent regulatory filings.】

item.title: 哈德逊湾、摩根士丹利第一季度入股特朗普社交媒体公司
item.description: 周三的证券文件显示，哈德逊湾资本管理公司（Hudson Bay Capital Management）、Geode 资本管理公司（Geode Capital Management）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）等大型机构投资者在第一季度持有唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的特朗普传媒科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）的股票。【原文：Hudson Bay Capital Management, Geode Capital Management and Morgan Stanley were among the large institutional investors that took positions in Donald Trump's Trump Media & Technology Group in the first quarter, securities filings showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 文件显示，拜登的个人财务状况在 2023 年变化不大
item.description: 联邦文件显示，美国总统乔-拜登在 2023 年披露的个人财务状况变化不大，尽管他的图书版税收入有所下降，他所欠的房屋净值贷款额也有所上升。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden disclosed a little-changed personal financial situation in 2023, though his book royalties fell and the amount he owed on a home equity loan rose, federal documents showed.】
